ygData.subject: RE: AC Dilemma
ygData.msgSnippet: ... FWIW, a while back I did a quick damage test with myself at about 530 AC (plate) vs 450 AC (mesh).  At 530, wisps regularly hit me for 1-2 points with the
ygData.messageBody:
On Wed, 10 Nov 1999, Reece, Tom - 25IDL G4 wrote:
>
> You would expect this to be the case but I don't think anyone has ever
> confirmed it to be true. This topic has been discussed on many occasions on
> this list. As far as I know, no one has been able to determine if AC is the
> only factor in determining how much damage you receive per hit or if armor
> type plays a role (i.e. deflects part of the blow). Guess the best way to
> test it is to find a monk with the same AC as you and start collecting data.

FWIW, a while back I did a quick damage test with myself at
about 530 AC (plate) vs 450 AC (mesh). At 530, wisps
regularly hit me for 1-2 points with the occasional 20+. At
450 they regularly hit me for 20+ (I didn't count misses).

I "repeated" this test about 10 levels later, at 540 AC but
naked. Wisps were regularly hitting me for 1-2 points with
the occasional 20+. If level is not a factor, then it would
seem only AC matters. I believe Brad said as much recently.
I am firmly in the "only AC matters" camp at the moment.

--
John H. Kim
kim@...
